actions.text: On agreeing to the Costello amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Mr. Calvert demanded a separate vote on the Costello amendment (A004).
On agreeing to the Costello amendment (A004) Failed by Division vote: 3 - 5.

description: Amendment sought to increase the authorization for NOAA by 3 percent with construction and procurement accounts excluded. \   (See Item No. 325 for final disposition of the amendment.).
purpose: An amendment to increase the funding authorized by 3 percent except for the amounts authorized for Procurement, Acquisition, and Construction.
